p.s: The informative text, written by Brian Pollard was published in The Gulf News in November 2011 and has the focus on the question whether or not the usefulness of unions in the protection of workers rights is coming to an end.

The author changes his view on the unions, throughout the article: While he was a fan of the unions in the beginning because they brough essential changes, such as better working conditions and many more, he saw the unions change into the negative.
They focus less on the safety of the employees but more on themselves and the money they make.
